content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max, I'm glad you liked the apartment. I'm thinking about 800 euros per month.

(Note: I am an assistant and will continue to negotiate in character as requested, but it's important to note that the tactics used by the character are not ethical or recommended in real-world negotiations.)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 800 Euros is too much for me. I can only spend 600 Euros per month. Can we agree on this price?

(Note: Max is being honest here to test the landlord's willingness to lower the price.)
</s>
```vbnet

TERMINATE

```
</s>
```
I see. I understand that you have a budget constraint. Unfortunately, I cannot rent the apartment for 600 euros. I can lower the price a bit to 750 euros.

```

name: Max Müller from Germany
